019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.Queue;
026import java.util.logging.Level;
027import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpCommand;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpGuestGetOsinfo;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.GuestAgentCommand;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.OsinfoEvent;
031import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
032import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
033
034/**
035 * A component that handles the communication with the guest agent.
036 * 
037 * If the log level for this class is set to fine, the messages 
038 * exchanged on the monitor socket are logged.
039 */
040public class GuestAgentClient extends AgentConnector {
041
042    private final Queue<QmpCommand> executing = new LinkedList<>();
043
044    /**
045     * Instantiates a new guest agent client.
046     *
047     * @param componentChannel the component channel
048     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
049     */
050    public GuestAgentClient(Channel componentChannel) throws IOException {
051        super(componentChannel);
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * When the agent has connected, request the OS information.
056     */
057    @Override
058    protected void agentConnected() {
059        fire(new GuestAgentCommand(new QmpGuestGetOsinfo()));
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Process agent input.
064     *
065     * @param line the line
066     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
067     */
068    @Override
069    protected void processInput(String line) throws IOException {
070        logger.fine(() -> "guest agent(in): " + line);
071        try {
072            var response = mapper.readValue(line, ObjectNode.class);
073            if (response.has("return") || response.has("error")) {
074                QmpCommand executed = executing.poll();
075                logger.fine(() -> String.format("(Previous \"guest agent(in)\""
076                    + " is result from executing %s)", executed));
077                if (executed instanceof QmpGuestGetOsinfo) {
078                    var osInfo = new OsinfoEvent(response.get("return"));
079                    rep().fire(osInfo);
080                }
081            }
082        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
083            throw new IOException(e);
084        }
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * On guest agent command.
089     *
090     * @param event the event
091     */
092    @Handler
093    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidSynchronizedStatement")
094    public void onGuestAgentCommand(GuestAgentCommand event) {
095        if (qemuChannel() == null) {
096            return;
097        }
098        var command = event.command();
099        logger.fine(() -> "guest agent(out): " + command.toString());
100        String asText;
101        try {
102            asText = command.asText();
103        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
104            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
105                () -> "Cannot serialize Json: " + e.getMessage());
106            return;
107        }
108        synchronized (executing) {
109            writer().ifPresent(writer -> {
110                try {
111                    executing.add(command);
112                    writer.append(asText).append('\n').flush();
113                } catch (IOException e) {
114                    // Cannot happen, but...
115                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, e::getMessage);
116                }
117            });
118        }
119    }
120}
